Vote eosdacserver Member Client

The eosDAC Toolset

We are using different tools for our work as a decentralized community. Additionaly we are building custom open source tools which fit our needs and which we make available to the community.

Member Client

The eosDAC Member Client can be used by every member of the DAC, to sign the constitution, vote for custodians and participate in the DAC.

Visit Member Client

Github

We are using Github to collaborate on the code for our different tools. Find our more and follow the development activity at github.com/eosdac.

Visit Github

Token Explorer

The eosDAC Token Explorer can be used to check the token price, transactions and holders of the EOSDAC token.

Visit Token Explorer

eosDAC Token

The eosDAC token explorer lets you see balances and transfers of the EOSDAC token on chain, holding accounts, as well as the current market price and volume.

  • Token contract: eosdactokens
  • Token symbol: EOSDAC
  • Total Supply: 1.200.000.000 EOSDAC

SmartContracts

eosDAC provides smart contracts, which allows it to be operated in a fully transparent manner on the EOSIO blockchain.

Read more
